course_title: Introduction to Genetic and Molecular Epidemiology
class_notes: First year MPH/MSPH students interested in pursuing the Genetic and Molecular Epidemiology Certificate enrollment preference, second year students with instructor permission.
course_description: This course will introduce basic principles of genetic and molecular epidemiology through interactive discussion with leading researchers in the field. This is a stand-alone course but is also a prerequisite for the Genetic and Molecular Epidemiology Certificate Program.
sections: Class Nbr: 3157, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 3-3:50p, Instructor: Huels/Casey, Status: Open
